Articles.Content: I would like to know if collision sensors could be added in a future update, for example, proximity sensors where when reaching a certain distance from the ground, the ship could trigger another mechanism through the sensor, it would be great, as it would open up a multitude of unmanned missions where the player does not need to be present.
This is like day 900 of people asking for there to be some kind of stock scripting. All we can do right now is wait and see.
